Subject: [cantera] Building with V=
isual Studio

I've been working on building Cantera using MS Visual Studio =
2005 from
the most recent CVS source, and it appears that the vcproj files =
in CVS
are out of date. In addition to the issues with converting to the ne=
w
compiler version (various spurious warnings), it seems like there has
bee=
n a reorganization of the Cantera source files which required quite a
few c=
hanges to the project files. 

I was able to get the Cantera to compile cle=
anly (apparently) with my
modified project files, and I was wondering it wo=
uld be useful for me to
provide these files, or whether there are other pla=
ns to update the
provided Visual Studio project files.

inks
